sqlMap.select:
select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_Date, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_Date, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_Date, N_MODIFIED, AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, REGISTER_BANKROLL, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, LOCATION, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
order by $orderByClause$

select N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_Date, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_Date, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_Date, N_MODIFIED, AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, REGISTER_BANKROLL, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, LOCATION, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #merchantId:DECIMAL#

sqlMap.update:
update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #record.merchantId:DECIMAL#
N_LOGIN_ID = #record.loginId:DECIMAL#
CONTACTS_NAME = #record.contactsName:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #record.contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#
FIXED_PHONE = #record.fixedPhone:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_EMAIL = #record.contactsEmail:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_NAME = #record.corporateName:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_LOCATION = #record.corporateLocation:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #record.corporateProperty:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_TRADE = #record.corporateTrade:VARCHAR#
N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #record.enterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#
D_FOUND_Date = #record.foundDate:Date#
N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #record.enterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#
POSTALCODE = #record.postalcode:VARCHAR#
UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #record.uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #record.organizationCode:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #record.enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #record.enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#
D_CREATE_Date = #record.createDate:Date#
N_CREATED = #record.createUser:DECIMAL#
D_MODIFY_Date = #record.modifyDate:Date#
N_MODIFIED = #record.modifyUser:DECIMAL#
AUTHENTICATION_STATUS = #record.authenticationStatus:DECIMAL#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #record.businessLicenceRegister:VARCHAR#
BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT = #record.businessTimeLimit:VARCHAR#
REGISTER_BANKROLL = #record.registerBankroll:DECIMAL#
BUSINESS_SCOPE = #record.businessScope:VARCHAR#
BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #record.bankAccountName:VARCHAR#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT = #record.bankOfDeposit:VARCHAR#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME = #record.bankOfDepositBranchName:VARCHAR#
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #record.companyAccount:VARCHAR#
N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #record.certificateType:DECIMAL#
CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #record.certificateNumber:VARCHAR#
LOCATION = #record.location:VARCHAR#
CERTIFICATE_PICTURE = #record.certificatePicture:VARCHAR#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION = #record.businessLicenceLocation:VARCHAR#

update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO set N_LOGIN_ID = #loginId:DECIMAL#, CONTACTS_NAME = #contactsName:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#, FIXED_PHONE = #fixedPhone:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#, CONTACTS_EMAIL = #contactsEmail:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_NAME = #corporateName:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_LOCATION = #corporateLocation:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #corporateProperty:VARCHAR#, CORPORATE_TRADE = #corporateTrade:VARCHAR#, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #enterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#, D_FOUND_Date = #foundDate:Date#, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #enterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#, POSTALCODE = #postalcode:VARCHAR#, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#, ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#, D_CREATE_Date = #createDate:Date#, N_CREATED = #createUser:DECIMAL#, D_MODIFY_Date = #modifyDate:Date#, N_MODIFIED = #modifyUser:DECIMAL#, AUTHENTICATION_STATUS = #authenticationStatus:DECIMAL#, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT = #businessTimeLimit:VARCHAR#, REGISTER_BANKROLL = #registerBankroll:DECIMAL#, BUSINESS_SCOPE = #businessScope:VARCHAR#, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #bankAccountName:VARCHAR#, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT = #bankOfDeposit:VARCHAR#, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME = #bankOfDepositBranchName:VARCHAR#, COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #companyAccount:VARCHAR#, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #certificateType:DECIMAL#, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #certificateNumber:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE = #certificatePicture:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION = #businessLicenceLocation:VARCHAR# where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #merchantId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select c.* from login_info l, login_rose_rel t, commercial_tenant_basic_info c where l.n_login_id = t.n_login_id and t.n_customer_type_id = 5 and c.n_commercial_tenant_id = t.n_commercial_id and t.n_login_id =#loginId:NUMBER#

select c.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID merchantId,c.contacts_Email contactsEmail,c.CORPORATE_NAME corporateName,l.MOBILE mobile,pi.HEAD_SCULPTURE headSculpture from login_info l, login_rose_rel t, commercial_tenant_basic_info c,PERSONALITY_INFO pi where l.n_login_id = t.n_login_id and pi.n_login_id = l.n_login_id and t.n_customer_type_id = 5 and c.n_commercial_tenant_id = t.n_commercial_id and t.n_login_id =#loginId:NUMBER#

select f.n_commercial_tenant_id from commercial_tenant_basic_info f,suppliers_info su where f.n_commercial_tenant_id=su.merchant_id and (su.status = 2 or su.status = 3 or su.status = 5 )
f.corporate_name=#corporateName:VARCHAR#
f.n_commercial_tenant_id !=#merchantId:NUMBER#
